Metadata.Title: Ghost of Hokkaido
Metadata.Description: 47.  I have the location of the remaining parties responsible for the cloning experiments...2 of the individuals are directly responsible for developing you...The Agency has direct involvement in this matter and I cannot offer you any assistance with this mission if you choose to accept it.  The 5 scientists and ICA operatives listed in this email are only part of it.  The entire Hokkaido facility needs to be destroyed along with everyone there.  End this and end them all....Good luck. I......
